ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:1}); // Shinra soldier
“There he is!
It's Corneo!
Don't let him get away!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:4}); // “Help me.
Help me.
Help me…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:7}); // “He's in the pagoda next to Lord Godo.
Lord Godo says we're stuck…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:5}); // “Num, num…
I hope Meteor doesn't
fall anywhere around here…”

dialogStrings:
Shinra soldier
“There he is!
It's Corneo!
Don't let him get away!”

“Num, num…
I hope Meteor doesn't
fall anywhere around here…”

“Oh, Great Da-chao…
Please grant us your strength…”

“He's in the pagoda next to Lord Godo.
Lord Godo says we're stuck…”
